text: Shane Yarran (2 June 1989 â€“ 20 April 2018) was a professional Australian rules footballer. He was raised in Midvale, Perth, Western Australia. He played for the Fremantle Football Club in the Australian Football League (AFL). He was drafted with the 61st selection in the 2015 national draft. On 20 April 2018, Yarran committed suicide in his Seville Grove, near Perth, Western Australia home at the age of 28. ==References== ==Other websites== *WAFL playing statistics Category:1989 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Suicides in Australia Category:Australian rules footballers Category:Sportspeople from Western Australia
title: Shane Yarran
